response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its true value to be well above $10,000. However, to facilitate a transaction and explore mutual interests, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure you get the most out of this investment. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 15000}
